title: Strengthening Programming Practical Competencies: Changes in Learner Engagement in Workplace e-Learning: Branching Scenarios

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental concepts in the job field
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Students can perform decision-making processes reflecting real job scenarios with over 80% accuracy through quarterly scenario-based tasks.
Learners can analyze errors and propose at least three improvement strategies based on feedback after scenario-based learning.
Learners can evaluate their learning engagement and cognitive load levels at 4 points or higher on a 5-point scale through a survey at the end of the course.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
